Package org.jdesktop.jdic.desktop.internal

Interface Summary
BrowserService The BrowserService interface provides interaction with the system default browser.
LaunchService The LaunchService interface provides opening, editing or printing the given file by launching the associated application.
MailerService The MailerService interface provides methods to launch message compose window of the default mailer with or without prefilled message fields.
 

Class Summary
ServiceManager The ServiceManager class provides static fields to refer to the available services, and static methods to get the approprate service objects with the given service name.
 

Exception Summary
LaunchFailedException Thrown by methods when the contenting handling application, or the system browser, or the system mailer client fails to be launched.
